name: es7-react-js-snippets
description: Extensions for React (React-Native) and Redux in JS/TS with ES7+ syntax. Customizable. Built-in integration with prettier.

esReactSnippets.settings.prettierEnabled.markdownDescription: Integrate prettier settings with code generated from snippets.

esReactSnippets.settings.importReactOnTo.markdownDescription:
Controls if snippets should add `import React from 'react';` at the top of components.
Use if you have React +17 and use jsx transform.

esReactSnippets.settings.typescript.markdownDescription: Controls if React components have typescript Props typing.

esReactSnippets.settings.semiColons.markdownDescription:
Controls if snippets should use semi colons.
Only applies when `#esReactSnippets.settings.prettierEnabled#` is disabled

esReactSnippets.settings.singleQuote.markdownDescription:
Controls if snippets should use single quotes.
Only applies when `#esReactSnippets.settings.prettierEnabled#` is disabled

esReactSnippets.settings.tabWidth.markdownDescription:
Controls how many spaces snippets will have.
Only applies when `#esReactSnippets.settings.prettierEnabled#` is disabled

esReactSnippets.settings.typescriptCompo.markdownDescription: Controls which prefix for typescript snippets should use for props/state.

scripts.compile: rm -rf lib; tsc -p ./ --noEmit false --module commonjs --outDir lib
